thread.title: MLB playoffs: Ranking the best Game 5's in Division Series history
thread.title_full: MLB playoffs: Ranking the best Game 5's in Division Series history

author: Joe Giglio | NJ Advance Media for NJ.com
title: MLB playoffs: Ranking the best Game 5's in Division Series history
text:
Comments 
deGrom vs. Greinke. New York Mets vs. Los Angeles Dodgers. The two biggest markets in baseball going head-to-head for a trip to the NLCS. As far as deciding games go, it doesn't get much bigger than what will unfold in Chavez Ravine tonight. 
As we get as pumped as the players for tonight's game, it's natural to anticipate an all-time great Game 5. Since the current five-game League Division Series format took form for the 1995 season, baseball has treated fans to some classic Game 5's in this round. If the 2015 Mets-Dodgers deciding game goes down as an instant classic, it will have to nudge out one of these games to enter a list like this.
